p.s: The Hate U Give is an American drama film which was directed by George Tillmann Jr. in 2018, based on the novel of the same name by Angie Thomas.
It is a story about a black teenager, Starr Carter, who witnesses the shooting of the friend Khalil by a white police officer.
The story unfolds after the time of the killing, describing how Starr deals with the situation.
The given sequence takes place in the middle of the movie, right after Starr gave her interview on TVtelevision.
Starr and her family have dinner at a restaurant.
They start eating and Starr looks outside.
She sees King and two other gang members of the King Lords in front of the restaurant.
Maverick, her father, sees them too and decides to go outside to have a fight with King.
When the police arrives, King and the gang members disappear and they ask Maverick if he has a problem.
The police officer, who is also black like Maverick, pushes him to the ground for no acceptable reason.
Then Starr and other people film the situation and the police officers decide to drive away.
